title: The Next Leicester City Manager Odds Revealed
text:
The Next Leicester City Manager Odds Revealed Thu Feb 23 2017 22:46:43 GMT+0000 (GMT) Thu Feb 23 2017 22:46:43 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
It breaks my heart to say this but, Leicester City will have to replace Claudio Ranieri sooner rather than later as they prepare themselves for a relegation dog fight in the coming days, weeks and months. 
Hours after Ranieri was sacked, bookies scraped together odds on who would become the next permanent Leicester manager, and It looks like another Premier League title winner is favourite to land the job, according to Ladbrokes. 
Former Manchester City manager Roberto Mancini is the clear favourite to succeed Ranieri, with odds of 7/4 going in his favour. 
Mancini, who made four appearances for Leicester during his playing days, leads the way ahead of former Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew and another former Foxes man Nigel Pearson. 
The 52-year-old enjoyed a successful spell at Manchester City from 2009 to 2013, and after Mancini left Inter Milan on mutual terms, he is obviously ready to return to management. 
According to Ladbrokes , here are the next Permanent Leicester City manager odds (at the time of writing) 
Roberto Mancini - 7/4
